name: Be brave (Sorpirit)
description:
▼"Be brave" what is going on here?▼

The little knight got lost in the dungeon and can't find his way out. Dangerous monsters await in the corridors of the dungeon... Help the knight overcome dangers and escape to freedom!

▼How to play?▼

To successfully complete the game, collect 60 gold coins. You need to use cards to create a path for the knight so he can escape.

  • Keep an eye on the health of the knight, because monsters will try to hurt him!
  • Item cards will help you defeat monsters and get through dangers of the forgotten dungeon. Shield will provide more health points when the sword will help the knight to defeat monsters.
  • You can move your camera with W A S D
▼Good luck!▼▼Credits▼
